title: Game Crashing for everyone
body: i was in a ranked game and everyone from both teams were being disconnected about every 30 seconds. My team lost the game which was unfair as we were unable to do anything the entire game but we still lost lp and the other team gained points. Why was there not even a loss prevention for that game when everyone was dc over and over again?

replies.body:
The game will only be halted if everyone in the game disconnects permanently, which is what not happened. The game thinks everyone just had a bit of lag.

Nothing can be done about it at this point, but at least now you know what's currently happening. Don't play ranked for the moment.
